characterDescription:
Marri is a Lady's Maid of Shallan's who accompanies Shallan on the Alethi army's expedition that would unearth the truth and determine the future of the Shattered Plains, the Parshendi, and Alethkar itself, culminating in the battle of Narak.
Shallan wouldn't allow Marri to ride in her coach because she didn't want to explain Pattern to the girl.
